archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0654
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The Collections solution shall enable customer accounts to be identified for special (manual) Collections treatment Including: 1. Disputes/Complaints 2. Treat With Care 3. Fraud 4. Natural Disaster 5. Medical dependency 6. Deceased 7. Test Accounts 8. Insolvency 9. Bankruptcy 10. Suspension or Lost/Stolen 11. Temp Hold

properties.value: What do you mean by special manual collections? Does it mean that Comarch should exclude that customer from automated collection process? Requirement clear. Comarch have to check customer flag and stop collections mechanism. Just one reason will be selected.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
